suggest.ext-zip: Make sure this extension is available to work with ZIP files.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.avatar: Install this extension to enable user profile photo.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.form: Install this extension to retain form values when error occurs during submission.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.gravatar: Install this extension to enable user profile photo automatically based on the specified email address.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.panel.skin: Install this extension to enable panel skin feature.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.panel.skin.default: At least install a default skin just to know the difference.
